name: the emperor
description:
*to receive these games in your email inbox, sign up to the tinyletter*

I'm challenging myself to write one small twine game per fortnight. Each game will feature one new mechanic I haven't used before and will draw inspiration from one Major Arcana tarot card. 

'the emperor' is the third in this series and features the text box macro in SugarCube 2.21.0.

thanks for playing xx
